inn1.comm: Right on money. Full in length, just outside off and it keeps a tad low, Tharanga covers the off stump and shoulders arms
fuller, on the middle and leg, flicked to square-leg
in the zone outside off , leans forward, pushes to point
on the middle line, straightens, Tharanga is bit late in leaning forward, gets a inside-edge to square-leg
beaten In the corridor outside off, Tharanga has a lame poke and is beaten
beaten again. Tharanga goes for a loose drive outside off but can't connect though
fullish, comes in and Jayasuriya is struck on the pad, going for a drive
on the off stump line, pushed to mid-off for a quick single
Crack. Full-pitched, on middle and leg and Tharanga eases forward, knives through the line, on the up, over mid-on.
Another boundary. Streaky this time. Fullish, outside off and Tharanga frees his arms, gets a thickish outside edge and the ball flies past the slips and to the boundary
Wallop. This time over cover. Full-pitched and outside off, Tharanga smokes it over extra cover for yet another boundary. Suddenly the runs are coming in a flood.
full and on the middle and leg, Tharanga flicks, gets a edge through the backward square leg
Asif shifts line, hurls on the off stump line but Tharanga is ready, eases it through extra cover region for couple of runs
beaten cracker of a delivery. full in length, around off stump and it bounces even as Jayasuriya pushes his bat in defense and he is beaten comprehensively
short in length, on the off stump line, Jayasuriya plays his favourite punch shot, straight to point
Fullish, on the middle and leg, not the line to bowl at Jayasuriya who shuffles across and flicks it over midwicket.
length-delivery, on the stumps and Tharanga deflects it towards midwicket
around the off stump area, Jayasuriya gets behind the line, pushes it towards cover. No chance of a run.
again driven to cover. Jayasuriya is middling them well but straight to the fielders
fullish, on the legs, Jayasuriya tries to flick, misses and it runs off the pad towards fine-leg region
full in length, around the off stump, moving away, Tharanga leans across, drives on the up and it races through the backward point region
on the middle and leg, turned past midwicket for couple of runs
short in length, around the off stump, pushed to point for a quick single
on the hips, clipped away to fine leg for a single
short in length, on the middle and leg, Jayasuriya swivels, pulls it away towards square-leg, slight fumble there and they will get a run
Short and outside off and Tharanga helps himself to a boundary with a fiercely cut shot over point
leans forward, pushes a length-delivery to the off side for a quick single
on the off stump line, Asif drives, gets a inside-edge to fine-leg region for couple of runs
full-pitched, on the middle line and Tharanga eases it back to the bowler
And again.
Asif continues to leak runs. Strange. full and on the legs, Jayasuriya leans forward, places it deftly past the short fine-leg fielder for a boundary
on a length, around off stump and Tharanga respects it by pushing it towards cover
slightly shorter in length, around off again, Tharanga nudges it towards point for a single
Classic Jayasuriya. Short-arm pull for a six. Short in length, on the middle and leg and Jayasuriya mucles it over midwicket. Up ... up and over.
Jayasuriya tries to hustle the bowler, charges down the track and Najaf hurls it short and wide and it bounces over the 'keeper.
sanity returns, fullish, on the middle, pushed back to the bowler.
short in length, on the off stump line, Jayasuriya shapes to punch it through off side, gets a inside-edge to midwicket
fuller, on the pads, Jayasuriya wants to flick it away, misses and it rolls over to the on side off the pads.
starts off right on target, on the middle stump line, defended back to the bowler
short in length, around the off stump, Tharanga drives but edges it past gully for a single
beaten Full in length, around the off stump, bounces over as Jayasuriya is beaten all hands up. Lovely nagging line from Anjum.
Short in length, outside off stump, Jayasuriya gets behind the line this time, on top of the bounce, pushes it to point
And again
again short but bit more width and Jayasuriya cuts to gully where Hafeez makes a diving stop
full in length, in the zone outside off, Tharanga drives to cover
on the off and middle line, driven back to the bowler
shout for lbw. The ball came in the air and beat the intended drive and thudded into pad. But bit high on the pad and he survives
short on the middle and leg, Tharanga pulls it away to the leg side
Similar line and length, clipped away to midwicket for a single

Gotcha! He has chopped it on to the stumps! Disaster gatecrashes into the Sri Lankan party. It landed on a length, outside off and shaped back in, Jayasuriya went for a cut, was cramped for room as the ball nipped back in, got an inside-edge and on to the stumps.
full-pitched ,on the stumps, pushed back to the bowler
bit of rubbish, full and on the legs, Kapugedera clears it away with a flick shot through midwicket
length-delivery, on the middle and leg, turned down to fine-leg
full and well outside off, Tharanga goes for a drive through cover, gets a outside edge to thirdman boundary
full in length, on the off stump line, pushed back down the track
lands on the off stump line, on a length, comes back in a touch, Kapugdera shapes to drive, gets a inside-edge on to the pad
driven to mid-off, no run
full, on the middle and leg, worked to mid-on
back-of-length delivery, around off stump, punched to cover
again the cover comes into play.
full in length, on the leg and middle line, deflected to midwicket

Anjum is on fire. Teasing line, full and outside off, moving away off the seam and Tharanga is sucked into drive, on the up, but ends up nicking it behind. Big wicket. Tharanga looked in complete command there.
leaves outswinger alone
good bounce and gentle swing, left alone by Jayawardene
left alone outside off stump
wide of off stump, Mahela not tempted...again
defensive push with open face
outside edge races to third man boundary but a good tumbling stop saves a boundary
nicely cut behind square for another couple
left alone outside off stump
beautifully timed backfoot punch, finds the gap in the covers and races to the boundary
slower ball around the off stump, Kapugedera drives hard to mid-off
backfoot defensive with soft hands, Kapugedera calls through for a quick single
solidly played into the covers, Kapugedera is looking in good touch
tight line and good length, defensive push
another correct-looking defensive stroke
wider delivery and kapugedera misses a cover drive
this time he shoulders arms and that the end of anothet good over
watchful defensive stroke, Jayawardene looks determied to play himself in properly
charges down the track and launches over mid on, great shot and ball sails over long-on fence
opens the face and runs down to third man
chops down on a delivery that swings back in
superb cover drive, Jayawardene is perfectly balanced and he eases the ball through cover point
fuller in length on the off stump, driven to mid-off
good length ball on the off stump, guided down to thirdman
length ball on the off stump, pushed into the gap and an easy single taken
pitched up on the stumps, pushed back to the bowler
angled into the pads, Kapugedera swings but off the pads to fine leg
length ball on the leg stump, turned away through square leg
tossed-up, on the off stump line, pushed to cover
slightly short in length, outside off, cut to short third man region
driven to long off for a single
tossed-up, on the off stump, driven back to the bowler
on the off stump line, driven to cover
on the off stump line, Jayawardene gets behind the line, pushes to the off side
back of length, outside off, Jayawardene opens the bat-face, guides to third man

Anjum takes out another one. Short and well outside off stump, Kapudgedera's eyes lit up at the width offered and he went for an expansive cut but edges it behind and Akmal took a good diving catch to his left.
in the zone outside off, testing line and length, Silva lets that one fly past him
And again.
full and on the legs, tickled to fine-leg for a single
rings up the room service and is served a short and wide one, cuts it past point for a four
came forward, defended solidly to the off side
floated outside off, driven to cover
on the leg stump line, Silva goes for a sweep but doesn't connect properly
full-pitched, on the middle and leg, Jayawardene flicks to midwicket
full-pitched, on the off and middle, Silva drives to mid-off
goes back, gets behind the line of a length-delivery, around off , pushes to cover
on the money again, on the off and middle line, pushed back to the bowler
beaten. In the corridor outside off, Silva sits in the bedroom, has a poke at the delivery and is beaten. Got to move closer to the line.
tossed-up, outside off and driven, with the turn, to cover
on the off stump line, bit of air and Jayawardene sweeps it away behind square-leg for a single
short and outside off, goes back and across, cuts past point
floated outside off, driven to cover
on the off stump line again, defended on the front foot
full in length, around off stump, eased to cover region
full and on the middle and leg, flicked to midwicket
full and on the middle and leg, turned towards midwicket
short and wide, cut to cover but a good diving stop by Fawad prevents any chance of a run
run down to third man for a single
appeal for lbw but turned down. Jayawardene went for a sweep to a delivery outside off and is rapped on the pads. Point of impact outside off
goes for a cut shot but is beaten by the spin and then, by the bounce
gets off the strike with a dab to backward point
fullish, on middle and leg and Silva goes for his favourite sweep shot- plays that one really well
full and outside off, leans forward, opens the bat-face, runs it down to point
quickish, flatter, on the middle and leg, tickled behind square-leg
floated on the stumps, and again Silva goes for a sweep shot, to deep square-leg region for couple of runs
slightly short, outside off, cut towards backward point
Whack. Tossed-up, on the off stump line and Jayawardene leans across, and sweeps it from there over deep square-leg for maximum. Good clean swing of the bat.
short in length, on the leg and middle, flicked away behind square-leg for a single
big shout for lbw but again point of impact was just outside off, It was an arm-ball, coming in from outside off, Jayawardene goes across the line, misses
driven to long on for a single
another arm-ball, on the off stump line, defended on the front foot
floated on the middle and leg, flicked to deep square-leg region for a single
on the off and middle, driven back to the bowler
There comes the sweep again. He gets another run. Profitable shot for him.
short in length, comes in with the arm , just outside off and Jaywardene goes for a cut shot but is beaten
on the middle and leg, turned down to long leg for a single
arm-ball, on the middle and leg, flicked away through fine-leg
tossed-up, on the off stump line, pushed back to the bowler
on the middle and leg, and guess what, another sweep shot from Silva, another run
on the middle and leg again, flicked away to long leg for a single
tossed-up, on the middle and leg, Silva shapes to flick, gets a leading edge to cover
short in length, outside off and Jayawardene leans back and across, gets on top of the delivery and cuts through backward point
beautiful stroke, used his feet and hit inside-out over cover
beaten, sharp turn, Silva is disappointed
driven down the gound but straight to cover
comes down the wicket, but good flight delivery on leg stump and no run
missed an attempted sweep, appeal from Kamran Akmal but ball was heading down leg
pushed into off-side, good end to the over
flicked behind square bit straight to fielder
swept powerfully from outside leg
again, swept from outside leg, not quite timed
driven straight back to the bowler
shuffles across his stumps and eases it gracefully into the le side
tossed up on the off stump, Silva defends on the front-foot
cut into off side, straight to the fielder, no run
driven straight down the ground, but can't find the gap
tha's his fifty, superb stroke over mid off, dances down the track and launches
tossed up on the off stump, pushed back to the bowler
flicks to leg for a single
turned away on the front-foot through square leg
strong sweep stroke to leg
swept finer this time, but good fielding stops the two
missed sweep but they grab a leg bye
short ball driven off the back foot through the covers with a straight bat
short in length on the off stump, Silva makes room and pushes into offside
comes down the track, looking for a big one, but can only pick up a single
tucked off his pads for a single on the leg side
flicked to leg by Chamara
again Shah errs on the leg side and Mahela glances it fine to the boundary
driven straight down to long-off
bouncer that Chamara ducks underneath
anothet short ball, this time Chamara takes evasive action as it lifts sharply
neatly flicked to leg, so easy
a more vigourous sweep from Chamara, same result though
pushed down the ground to long on off the back foot
work through the leg side in front of square
driven to deep point...its tip and run at the moment
top edged sweep this time but it drops short of deep backward square
good delivery, Chamara is cramped for space as he tries to guide down to third man
good quick single on the leg side
can't find the gap as he tries to ease past point
wide delivery edged down to third man
opens the face and steers down to third man...but good bowling from Najaf Shah
good looking drive down to long off
pulled off the back foot
paddle sweep, Jayawardene might be in trouble here
good drive from Jayawardene looks to have saved him
tries to work to leg and gets a leading edge, bowler fields
aims a big stroke through midwicket but is deceived and drags it square
flicked to leg for easy single
beautifully pulled behind square and beats the fieldsman at long leg
perfect placement, he did not look to have hit it hard but he drove just to the left of cover to bring up the 100 partnership
delicate late cut down to third man for the single
driven on the up through the covers, but deep fieldsman saves the boundary
picks up easy single on leg side
driven straight back to the bowler
short ball, surprises Silva for pace, miscued pull picks up a single
driven straight down the ground...the new ball seems to be a little harder and is coming on to the bat
steered down to third man
slower ball, driven down to long off
driven straight down the ground
swept in front of square
dropped...goes for the big one over midwicket but hits it lower, should have been taken
sweeps behind square
no run as he tries to drive down the ground
another dot ball... a good over from Malik that deserved a wicket
flicked in front of square to bring up his fifty....excellent industrious innings
squeezes out a yorker for a single on the leg side
misses a pull stroke off a good bouncer
brilliant innovation, shovels the ball onto the leg side and into the gap, great wrists
drops down onto the leg side and scampers through for another quick single...a feature of this smart partnership
short outside off stump, Jayawardene cuts and goes wide of thirdman fielder, Anjum fumbles and ball runs away to the fence
reverse swept to short thirdman
tossed up around the off stump, Jayawardene goes down on one knee and tries to slog sweep over mid-wicket, misses it completely and ball hits the middle stump
pushed into covers
swept away to fine leg
pushed back to the bowler
arm ball down the legside
pitched up outside off stump, Silva goes for the drive and gets beaten
driven on the front-foot to sweeper cover
flat in trajectory, bit of turn and Maharoof beaten on the back-foot
tossed up on the off stump, Maharoof slogs and gets on the toe of bat, ball rolls down to long-on
arm ball outside off stump, hit the pads but lbw declined
steps out and goes for a big shot, edged down to thirdman
arm-ball, on the off stump line, moves forward, pushes it back to the bowler
There he goes. Runs down the track purposefully, reaches the pitch and heaves it over long on. Super strike
Hafeez gets his revenge. Serves a low full-toss, on the stumps, and Maharoof drives uppishly, to the left of Hafeez who dives to take it. SL lose their fifth wicket. 240 for 5.
works to midwicket region for a single
gets the edge right away but it falls short of the 'keeper. Full in length, in the temptation zone outside off and Lokuarachchi stabs at it
fuller, driven back to Asif
full-pitched, on the middle stump line, moving in, worked to midwicket
well-directed yorker, Silva takes out the front leg, jabs it away
Loku falls. It was full in length, around off stump, Lokuarachchi steps down the track, flicks, in the air and straight to deep midwicket.
full-pitched, on the off stump line, driven to cover
opts for the bouncer, Silva quickly ducks under that one .
back of length, on the middle and leg, Silva wrists it away to square-leg region for a single
low full-toss, on the off stump line, driven to cover
tossed-up, and Silva advances down the track, bunts it past midwicket
quicker, arm-ball but it slips down the leg side and beats everybody

And now Silva falls. Death by aggression. Charges down the track, and Rehman quickly drags back the length and sends it outside off stump and Silva tried to play it across the line, gets a inside-edge and it crashes into the furniture.
off the mark right away and gives Dilshan the strike
classy drive through the covers for a much-needed boundar for Sri Lanka

brilliant fielding off the boundary and Prasanna Jayawardene is in trouble, TV Umpire called in and given out...came back for a two but Rao had moved quickly on the third man fence and threw flat and hard
defends to his first delivery. Lots of work for Sri Lanka to do now as they have to get at least 270
off the mark with a single to third man
inside edge to square leg
flick to deep square
driven straight down the ground
starts with a big wide down the leg side, well taken by Kamran Akmal
inswinger that Dilshan squirts into the leg sid for a single
chipped in the air just wide of extra cover and they scamper back for a couple
another wide, useful extras for sri Lanka
swings back into Malinga's pads and he picks up a single off inside edge and pad
squeezed away on the leg side for a single
full toss that is smeared onto the leg side, Malinga misses the gap
good full-length inswinger and Dilshan settles for a single
makes room and pushes to point, a direct hit would have run out Malinga
plays over the top of it and a valuable dot ball for Pakistan
slog straight down the ground as Malinga loses control of his bat
slower ball and a full toss, smashed to the mid-wicket boundary
anothet slower ball, Dilshan tries to smash to leg but misses
worked to leg for a single behind square
low full toss that is smashed over midwicket, powerful strike for the maximum
this time he backs away and carves over the top over extra cover, superbly innovative batting
in the block hole but hit straight down teh ground and Dilshan will be able to pick-up a couple of runs
short ball this time that surprises Dilshan and he can only pick up a single down to long leg
squeezes out a yorker and picks up another boundary, this time down to fine leg
sloged to leg and a run out as they try to come back for a suicidal second run... but Sri Lanka finish with a decent total

inn2.comm: starts off with a shocker, way outside off and a wide called
full in length, around off stump, Salman leans forward, drives to mid-off
back of length, slipping on to the pad, Salman tries to flick, misses and is rapped on the pad
close to the off stump, on a length, Salman covers the off stump and lets it fly past him
length-delivery, just like the previous ball, punched to short cover
length-delivery, around the off stump line, pushed down the track
beaten. In the temptation zone outside off and Hafeez goes for a loose drive and is beaten
short in length, on the middle and leg,  Hafeez pulls it away to fine leg
short in length again, but around the off stump line and Salman punches it on the up to cover
drifts on to the legs and Salman flicks it away through midwicket region
on the legs, Hafeez wants to flick it away, loses balance and doesn't connect and it runs off the pad

Eary jhatka for Pakistan. Early blow ie. It landed on a length, around the off stump line, Salman initially looked to play but wanted to leave it alone at the last minute. Too late. It collided with the inside-edge and disturbed the furniture.
shout for lbw as the ball cuts back in from outside off stum and beats the intended poke to the on side. Struck high on the pad though.
again it darts back in, late, and Hameed is bit late in pushing forward in defense and gets a inside-edge on to the pad
length-delivery, around the off stump, Hameed gets on top of the bounce, punches on the up but straight to cover
short in length, slips on to the leg and middle, Hameed whips it away to deep square-leg
length-delivery, homing in on the stumps, Hafeez pushes it back to the bowler
again full in length, on the middle and leg, driven to mid-on
short in length, outside off stump, Hafeez leans back and across and cuts uppishly through cover point for a boundary
Another. Hafeez latches on to a shortish delivery and pulls it over midwicket.
full in length, slower in pace, driven to cover
strays down leg side and Hameed just helps it around the corner for four
better delivery and good fielding from Dilshan at point but Hameed still picks up a single
played defensively as the ball keeps a little low
charges down the crease and tries to flay over the top, but Maharoof sees him coming and drops short
driven off the back foot straight into the covers
tucked up as the ball nips into him
streaky inside edge past leg stump, came within a whisker of being bowled
driven straight to a well-positioned short cover
whipped off his hips but straight to the backward fieldsman saving one
driven on the the up, no run
slower delivery, cracked off his legs to deep square leg fence
short ball and well pulled in front of square
ducks under a well-direted bouncer, end of a good over for Pakistan
wide delivery and expansive drive through the off side
cramped for room as the ball jags back off the seam
wild drive off a good length deliver but the ball rises more than he expects and he misses
another good delivery that nips away off the nip
comes forward watchfully and plays defensively onto the off side
mistimes cover drive off a wide ball that should have been put away
chops first ball down to third man
short on the stumps and nipping in, batsman tries to whip it away but misses, off the hips to gully region
swivel pull straight to square leg
beaten by a delivery that nips back through the gate
plays defensively off the back foot  as the ball seams back into him
clipped down to long leg for a single
brilliant stroke, leans back and creams through the off side
big swing and miss
top straight drive off an over-pitched delivery from Maharoof
ball keeps low and passes straight through to the keeper
drives straight to mid on and picks up a single
pushes into the off side
ouch. Goes for a bouncer, tennis-ball bounce there and Hafeez goes for a pull shot and the ball rams into the helmet.
ouch again. This time on the gloves. Short in length, it kicks up and Hafeez stabs at it and is struck o n the gloves
low full-toss, on the legs, flicked to long leg
on the off stump line, pushed to cover
fullish on the off stump line, driven to mid-off
walks down the wicket and tries to smash over the top, miscues and hits straight to mid on
short of length, outside off, dabbed down to third man
opens the face to the bat and delicately steers down to third man... top shot
opens the face to the bat and delicately steers down to third man... top shot
on the off stump line, steered to gully
slower ball outside off stump, play and a miss
driven hard back to the bowler
beaten by a fast ball that bouces steeply
clipped off the pads down to long leg

mix-up in the middle and Dilshan hits the stumps direct from point, brillaint fielding that is out. Dilshan slipped while collecting the ball and still had the prescence of mind to throw the the stumps
beaten outside off by a delivery that bounces sharply
edged down to third man
compact defensive stroke off the back foot
driven straight to cover off the back foot
handsome stroke, eased through the covers and perfectly placed
short in length outside off stump, cut away to point

Fernando strikes, hits the pitch hard and suprises Hameed, who tries to pull, with some extra pace. The ball balloons up in the air and could have been caught by about five people. Sri Lanka are right on top.
good quick delivery and the skipper plays a jumping defensive stroke
left alone outside off stump, Dilhara pulls up a quickly and looks to be in discomfort
left alone again outside off stump...a wicket maiden
chops onto his pads
pulls straight to short midwicket
pushes into the off side and single is grabbed after a rare Dilshan misfield
driven straight to cover
solid-looking defensive stroke
another watchful defensive stroke from Malik
left alone, good delivery that rises sharply and seams in
good-length delivery squares-up Yousuf
out...full-length delivery catches Yousuf on the crease, clever change of length and a good fast delivery. This is turning out to be a really fine spell of bowling from Fernando.
brilliant return catch, taking nonchantly by Fernando in his follow through. Soft dismissal off a low full toss. Pakistan are now in disarray.
hat trick ball is safely negotiated with a defensive prod into the off side
work off his pads to midwicket
off the mark with a sweet cover drive, the end of another fine over from Fernando
full length delivery and firm drive straight back to Malinga who deflects it onto his stumps...unfortunate dismissal
ball keeps low and Malik jabs down...Pakistan have lost 5 wickets for 9 runs now
good length ball on the off stump, defended to cover
leg stump delivery and easily flicked for a two behind square
played defensively on the off side
just keeps out a delivery that keeps low, end of a good comeback over from Malinga
beaten outsid off stump with a rather stiff-looking defensive stroke
beaten again with a delivery angled across his body
this time he leaves alone, but he is looking very shaky
run down to the fieder at backward point
hit on the body as he takes his eye off a short ball
picks up a lucky boundary as he takes evasive action and gloves the ball down the legside
watchful defense into the off side
pushed to point and Dilshan shies at the non strikers end
Malinga errs on to Malik's pads and the ball is flicked away
good yorker well dug out
worked into the leg side for a single
opens the face and guides down to third man
flicked off his toes for a very welcome boundary through midwicket, looked like a misdirected slower delivery
brute of a delivery that cut-back and shaved the top of his leg stump
driven on the up but a brillaint diving stop at cover by Chamara Kapugedera
another neat clip through the leg side that is sweetly timed
defensive push into the covers
driven on the up straight to mid off
very slow deivery, Malinga lucky to have not been wided
left alone
plays and misses outside off stump
left alone again
Malinga comes around the wicket and its played defensively straight back down the pitch
beaten outside off stump
yorker on the stumps,  just dug out
hit straight back to the bowler
comes down the pitch and is defeated by sharp turn
drives off the backfoot down to long on
worked onto the leg side
hit straight down the ground and Dilshan fields
tucks off pads into a gap on the leg side
driven through the covers
misses as the ball turns back into the left-hander
clips straight to the midwicket fielder
again, can't get off strike from a slower ball
picks out midwicket again
great first over as midwicket stops another push
flighted delivery and well-driven straight down theground
comes forward and plays deensively, struggling to rotate the strike
picks out cover this time
finally, he misses the fielder and picks up a single
clipped straight back to Dilshan
worked through the leg side and Malik with retain the strike...
driven down to long off
hits the pads as he tries to work into the leg side
flighted delivery straight to midwicket
shorter ball and this is successfully hit into the gap for a single
driven to deep cover point
works straight to midwicket and anothet dot ball...the required run rate is rising fast now
comes down the pitch looking for a big one but the ball is too full and he squeezes out for a single
half-hearted appeal for a stumping...not out says the television umpire
edged to slip where the skipper fields
cut off the back foot for a single
finally a boundary as the RR soars over 8 per over, Dilshan drops short and Malik pulls
flighted delivery and smacked straight to midwicket
can't get the wrong'un away
another dot ball..problems for Pakistan as he can't get off strike
hits straight to bowler
drives straight to cover to complete a precious maiden over for SL
driven straight to mid wicket
driven to cover...Malik can't find the gaps now
down the wicket and he smashes a massive blow over deep square...just what the doctor and the compunder ordered
picks up an easy single
leans forward to defend. Tuk=tuk cricket on
cut straight to point, more wasted deliveries from Rehman
drives off the outside edge into a gap on the off side
works the ball to leg and rotates the strike....finally
drives down to long off for a single
bowled through the gate as the ball turns back sharply, also bowled a little quicker, going onto hit the top of middle and off stump. Another one bites the dust
beaten outside off stump by leg break
stroked straight to cover
driven straight down the ground
driven straight down the ground
pushes a ball on the off side defensively
half appeal for an lbw
one more dot ball...this is senseless cricket
squeezes out onto the off side but no run
drives to deep cover point
big stride forward and defensive stroke
beaten outside the off stump by a leg break
prods forward to sillypoint
sweeps and he keeps the strike from Malik
forward defensive and Sanath fields
nice stroke, over-pitched and hit away through the leg side
drive to mid off...is it time for Malinga?
yes, no, yes, no, yes, no....confusion in the running again but Malik sends Rao back in the end
brilliant stop by the captain off a square drive
driven straight to cover
driven straight down the ground and they pick-up two runs
muscles it through the covers...just a single though when he needs the big shots now
defended on the front-foot to cover
driven straight to mid on
driven for one after a misfield
good drive through extra cover for a couple of runs
nearly a run out chance but the batsman gets home
driven straight to cover
dances down the track and lofts a fine straight six
flatter and shorter deliver, but Malik still nicks a single to keep the strike
driven straight down to long off
defensive push, mix-up and now an appeal to the third umpire for a run out at the non-striker's end...just in
swept behind square
driven down the ground for a captain's fifty...much more work to do though
awkward-looking sweep and fails to connect
opens the face and pushes into a gap in the off-side ring
fuller length ball on the leg stump, flicked away to fine leg
driven straight to mid-wicket
full ball on the stumps, driven with straight bat to long-on
length ball outside off stump, Anjum lofts it over the cover fielder
down the legside
yorker on the stumps, inside edge onto the pads
tossed up outside off stump, Malik pushes and gets beaten
driven to sweeper cover
tossed up, pushed back to the bowler
pushes into point and a quick single taken
cut away to point
yorker, digs out to deep square leg
driven on the up to mid-off
driven to short cover
brilliant yorker well dug-out by Malik
another good yorker, this time on the leg side as Malik backs away
driven down the ground for a single...good over from Malinga
swept straight to short fine leg
gives him the charge and strikes well high and over the fence, goes all the way for a six
no run on the off side
wristy flick to leg to pick-up a couple
straight drive down to long off
sharp turn from around the wicket and he is beaten
low full toss that is cracked to mid wicket
square drive for a couple of runs
shorter deivery and driven straight down the ground
driven to cover
sharp single to short fine leg, umpire decides against calling for the third umpire
driven hard back to the bowler, misfield and a single taken
worked behind square...Malik looks very tired out there now
defensive push on teh off side
top edges an attempted sweep and Prasanna Jayawardene is gifted a simple catch behind the stumps
dropped first ball at slip by Mahela who did not appear to see it
defensive poke onto the leg side
defended, end of a good over for SL with another dot ball
backs away to make room but still Jayasuriya cramps him out
hit straight becak onto the stumps at non-strikers end
pulled high over midwicket and into a gap in the deep
picks up a single of a miscued heave
picks out the gap and trots through for easy single
huge six off on a bended-knee, the ball sails over deep-midwicket, great shot

square drive and Dilshan throws down the stumps again, this time at the non-striker's end. The umpire raises his finger and does not need help from the television umpire. Superb fielding from Dilshan who has hit the stumps frequently tonight
good yorker, turns down the chance of a run
heaved down the ground but can't find the boundary
left alone outside off stump
that's it, Maharoof wraps it up with an lbw that looked like it was missing off stump
